name: Timmy's Toy Box
description:
This is a game made in a month by a single developer. 

It is designed to look like you are reading a children's story book as you play one or all of the five multiplayer games. the games themselves are based on toy vehicles one might find in a child's toy box. There is a car, a tank, a boat, a plane and a spaceship level. Although the games can be played in single-player they are primarily multiplayer games and thus are best enjoyed with friends.
